scripts.prelearncode: echo GO TO THE IRON YARD
scripts.git-status: git status; echo PRESS ENTER TO CONTINUE..; read dummy; echo Continuing...
scripts.git-commit: npm run git-status; git add -A . && git commit -a -m 'Add commit from scripts'
scripts.git-push: echo DOING: git push origin master
scripts.deploy: npm run git-commit && npm run git-push
